name: Sky Frizz
description:
A sci fi action/adventure roguelike platformer

Play as a freelance intergalactic secret agent Sky Frizz and see what the evil Shade  Bots are up to on planet Aphid.

Collect items to help you traverse this randomized world, including jetpacks, quake mines, force fields, and Sky's signature tool/weapon the Sky Hook!

This is an old DOS based game so you will need DOSbox to run it, unless you're running it on an older PC. An installer may be added at a later date for those not DOSbox savvy.

There may be future updates (bug fixes etc.), but this is the complete game.
